title: Small satellite mission targets maritime activity monitoring from orbit
description:
Berlin, Germany (SPX) Dec 03, 2025


The OTTER Optical Traffic Tracking Experiment for Responsive Space satellite has entered service in orbit to support maritime monitoring following its launch on 28 November 2025 into an orbit at about 500 kilometres altitu…
